alert.note: Alert for Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 12:15PM CDT until May 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern White County in southeastern Illinois... Southwestern Wabash County in southeastern Illinois... Southwestern Gibson County in southwestern Indiana... Northeastern Posey County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1215 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Harmony, or 14 miles east of Carmi, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Poseyville around 1230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cynthiana, Owensville, Princeton and Mount Carmel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 17. Interstate 64 in Illinois near Mile Marker 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
